name: Jetboil Luna Satellite Burner
categories: Liquid fuel and white gas stoves
description: Add a compact satellite burner to a JetLink Genesis or Eureka Spire stove, so you can increase your capacity to melt snow, boil water or cook extra servings. This burner is designed to use with JetBoil FluxRing pots, and has the same bayonet mounting system found on JetBoil stoves.Uses JetBoil FluxRing pots.Attaches only to JetBoil/Eureka! Multi-burner JetLink.Packs down small into most JetBoil pots.Stable, low-to-the-ground design.Push button piezo ignition.
